entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
